alert.note: Alert for Belknap; Eastern Hillsborough; Interior Rockingham; Merrimack; Strafford (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 3:25PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Rockingham, southwestern Strafford, southeastern Hillsborough, southeastern Belknap and southeastern Merrimack Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 325 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles northwest of Hooksett to near Dracut. Movement was northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Manchester, Concord, Derry, Exeter, Salem, Northwood, Merrimack, Bedford, Hooksett, Litchfield, Epping, Loudon, Alton, Barnstead, Epsom, Brentwood, Gilmanton, Raymond, Pelham and Hudson. This includes the following highways... Interstate 293 between mile markers 1 and 11. Interstate 89 between mile markers 0 and 2. Interstate 93 between mile markers 0 and 39. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Belknap; Eastern Hillsborough; Interior Rockingham; Merrimack; Strafford
